message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to start.
Your turn, Alice.  I'm feeling generous, but let's not drag this out.
This is a serious offer, Bob.  Time is money, and we're both losing out with each round.
Alice, let's end this. A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest solution.  Every round costs us both.
